OrgName: ClearCommerce Corporation c/o Fidelity National Information Services, Inc.
activities: ClearCommerce licenses software for payment processing and fraud management solutions for the card-not-present market.  In the event of an issue with the software application, an EU client may transfer system logs and/or data for debugging to the customer support groups based in the U.S.
recoursemech: ClearCommerce uses American Arbitration Association (AAA)(http://adr.org) as a provider of a Safe Harbor compliant dispute resolution process.  Any complaints or questions will be forwarded to General Counsel.  Rules and procedures are available at http://www.adr.org/RulesProcedures
